channel.title: CVE Feed for google.golang.org/protobuf -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for google.golang.org/protobuf -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-24535|2024-08-02T11:03:17.765Z -- google.golang.org%2Fprotobuf -- google.golang.org%2Fprotobuf%2Fencoding%2Fprototext
item.description: Parsing invalid messages can panic. Parsing a text-format message which contains a potential number consisting of a minus sign, one or more characters of whitespace, and no further input will cause a panic.

item.title: CVE-2024-24786|2024-03-05T22:22:35.299Z -- google.golang.org%2Fprotobuf -- google.golang.org%2Fprotobuf%2Fencoding%2Fprotojson
item.description: The protojson.Unmarshal function can enter an infinite loop when unmarshaling certain forms of invalid JSON. This condition can occur when unmarshaling into a message which contains a google.protobuf.Any value, or when the UnmarshalOptions.DiscardUnknown option is set.
